channel.title: Gaining hitpoints instead of losing hitpoints lol
channel.description:
i maxed out bronze platelegs, platebody, kiteshield, full helm, and longsword with 2,000,000,000 in every stat for each. then when i attack another player, he gains hitpoints? why is that? lol. he should die in one hit in my case. he had over 600,000,000 hitpoints. and now i just got banned by my own server lol..this is annoying :P
EDIT - CLOSED for some reason it was a one time only bug. i wasnt really banned and i just kill in one hit. that was weird.

item.title: Gaining hitpoints instead of losing hitpoints lol
item.dc:creator: @DraculeMihawk DraculeMihawk
item.description:
@DraculeMihawk wrote:

Not a bug really whenever you pot this will probly happpen it goes over max you can hit. (idk what the max you can hit is tho)

Read full topic
